data.title: All Academic Programs
data.meta_description: Explore Ivy Tech Community College's associate degrees and certificates in more than 70 programs from accounting to visual communications.
data.text:
Accounting

Gain real-world accounting experience with software such as QuickBooks and Sage 50, while also partnering with CPA firms across the state.
